dc_title_s: Geothermal Energy Power Plants: United States, Summer 2014
dc_description_s: This point dataset represents physical locations of existing geothermal energy plants in the United States. This layer is part of a collection of GIS data for renewable and electric energy in the U.S. This layer is from the 2014 Summer Quarter update (Update 1016).This shapefile can be used to locate geothermal energy power plants in the United States.
